THE SKY'S NO LONGER THE LIMIT Dear {{lead.Salutation:default=edit me}} {{lead.Full Name:default=valued customer}},
If you still believe that “take-off” means “turn-off” then it’s time to think again – because your passengers are now demanding to stay connected whenever and wherever they are. Fortunately, the age of global, reliable, high-speed airborne connectivity is upon us – and it’s now available for you through Honeywell and ExecuJet South Africa. JetWave™ is the exclusive hardware solution facilitating connection to Inmarsat’s Jet ConneX service, delivering an in-the-air broadband experience for business jet owners and operators which is comparable to on-the-ground connections. By selecting JetWave, you’ll be enabling your passengers with ‘office equivalent’ productivity and ‘home-equivalent’ connectivity. They’ll be able to send and receive emails, participate in conference calls or view streaming video. Your aircraft will be transformed in to an office in the sky or fully loaded entertainment zone with reliable and unparalleled connection speeds. Host a video-conference, browse the web and stream content without delays – it’s all possible with JetWave.
Get connected today and experience truly seamless connectivity whenever and wherever you travel around the world.
